fields.title: The care and feeding of portable media players under Linux
fields.body:
So, you have a portable media player that plays music, shows photos, and can play videos, how do you keep that player fed with media from your Linux box? Colin McGregor will give an introductory talk that will look at:

  • Ripping CDs into MP3 files.
  • Converting audio tapes into MP3 files
  • Putting photos onto your player
  • Putting videos onto your player
  • Where and how to get free, legal, content on-line

This will be an updated version of a well received talk Colin McGregor did earlier this year for NewTLUG.

fields.title: GTALUG Soup
fields.body: There will be an informal get together of Linux fans at the Pho Hung restaurant 350 Spadina Ave. to talk about Linux related topics over Vietnamese style food.
fields.body_html: There will be an informal get together of Linux fans at the Pho Hung restaurant 350 Spadina Ave. to talk about Linux related topics over Vietnamese style food.

fields.title: GTALUG Beer
fields.body: A large group of Linux fans will move to a nearby pub for further informal socializing.
